---
title: Run the migration
id: bearbnb-08-run-the-migration
---

# Run the migration

## Commit Message

```
Run the migration

```console
pnpm psy db:migrate
```
```

## Changes

```diff
diff --git a/api/src/openapi/mobile.openapi.json b/api/src/openapi/mobile.openapi.json

--- a/api/src/openapi/mobile.openapi.json
+++ b/api/src/openapi/mobile.openapi.json

     "title": "bearbnb | mobile",
     "description": "The autogenerated openapi spec for your app"
   },
-  "paths": {},
+  "paths": {
+    "/v1/host/places": {
+      "parameters": [
+        {
+          "in": "query",
+          "required": false,
+          "name": "cursor",
+          "description": "Pagination cursor",
+          "allowReserved": true,
+          "schema": {
+            "type": [
+              "string",
+              "null"
+            ]
+          }
+        }
+      ],
+      "get": {
+        "tags": [
+          "places"
+        ],
+        "description": "Paginated index of Places",
+        "responses": {
+          "200": {
+            "content": {
+              "application/json": {
+                "schema": {
+                  "type": "object",
+                  "required": [
+                    "cursor",
+                    "results"
+                  ],
+                  "properties": {
+                    "cursor": {
+                      "type": [
+                        "string",
+                        "null"
+                      ]
+                    },
+                    "results": {
+                      "type": "array",
+                      "items": {
+                        "$ref": "#/components/schemas/PlaceSummary"
+                      }
+                    }
+                  }
+                }
+              }
+            },
+            "description": "Success"
+          },
+          "400": {
+            "$ref": "#/components/responses/BadRequest"
+          },
+          "401": {
+            "$ref": "#/components/responses/Unauthorized"
+          },
+          "403": {
+            "$ref": "#/components/responses/Forbidden"
+          },
+          "404": {
+            "$ref": "#/components/responses/NotFound"
+          },
+          "409": {
+            "$ref": "#/components/responses/Conflict"
+          },
+          "422": {
+            "$ref": "#/components/responses/ValidationErrors"
+          },
+          "500": {
+            "$ref": "#/components/responses/InternalServerError"
+          }
+        }
+      },
+      "post": {
+        "tags": [
+          "places"
+        ],
+        "description": "Create a Place",
+        "requestBody": {
+          "content": {
+            "application/json": {
+              "schema": {
+                "type": "object",
+                "properties": {
+                  "name": {
+                    "type": "string"
+                  },
+                  "sleeps": {
+                    "type": "integer"
+                  },
+                  "style": {
+                    "type": "string",
+                    "enum": [
+                      "cabin",
+                      "cave",
+                      "cottage",
+                      "dump",
+                      "lean_to",
+                      "tent",
+                      "treehouse"
+                    ]
+                  }
+                }
+              }
+            }
+          }
+        },
+        "responses": {
+          "201": {
+            "content": {
+              "application/json": {
+                "schema": {
+                  "$ref": "#/components/schemas/Place"
+                }
+              }
+            },
+            "description": "Created"
+          },
+          "400": {
+            "$ref": "#/components/responses/BadRequest"
+          },
+          "401": {
+            "$ref": "#/components/responses/Unauthorized"
+          },
+          "403": {
+            "$ref": "#/components/responses/Forbidden"
+          },

+      }
+    },

+        {
+          "in": "path",

+          "schema": {
+            "type": "string"
+          }
+        }
+      ],
+      "get": {

+          }

+      },
